snippet: Fiji’s military commander said Tuesday that Syrian rebels have issued three demands for the release of 45 Fijian peacekeepers who have been held captive since late last week.
abstract: Brig Gen Mosese Tikoitoga, military commander of Fiji, says Al Qaeda-linked Nusra Front have issued three demands for release of 45 Fijian peacekeepers who have been held captive in Syria.
lead_paragraph: Fiji’s military commander said Tuesday that Syrian rebels have issued three demands for the release of 45 Fijian peacekeepers who have been held captive since late last week.

headline.main: Syria: Militants Set Demands for Release of Fijians
headline.print_headline: Syria: Militants Set Demands for Release of Fijians
